name: Macrophage
description:
This is my first ever submission to a game jam. I made it for the IndieCade 2020 Game Jam,  Jamming the Curve. It is based on the human immune system. It may seem like a simple game, but believe me it can be very hard. The average game time is between 1.5 minutes and 3 minutes. Total play time can be much longer depending on the player.

If you are an administrator  of the Jamming the Curve Game Jam, please contact me ASAP if I submitted this wrong. I'm not entirely sure how I was supposed to do it.
